Hines Award—Call for Nominations for 2016

Nominations Due February 28, 2016 The Hines Award, named for Theodore Hines, was established to honor those who have provided exceptional service to the American Society for Indexing (ASI). Past winners of the Hines Award have been instrumental in writing and editing books, publicizing ASI program and services, forming and supporting chapters or SIGs (or […]

Of Note…

Best Practices for Indexing

The new Best Practices for Indexing guide is now available to read or download here.

Hines Award 2016
Call for Nominations

The Hines Award was established to honor those who have provided exceptional service to ASI. If you know of someone who has offered distinguished service to ASI as an officer, board member, committee member, or on the local level, then please consider nominating that person for recognition. Read the rules on the ASI website and submit nominations by February 28, 2016 to Sandi Schroeder with subject line: Hines Award nomination.

ASI Publications Index Mashup

ASI, through its publisher Information Today, Inc., now has 15 books available in print, 13 of which are also in ebook format. A free cumulated index (mashup) of the indexes to these publications is now available both online and as a PDF download. Locators are coded by title and print page number. The book codes link to the order page for the book. View the online version of the index here.
